title: Mom, 27, 'allowed family friend to rape her two daughters who were under the age of 10 for years'
text:
An Ohio woman allowed an alleged rapist to continue to knowingly abuse her two young daughters 'for a few years,' authorities allege.

Federal agents arrested Marion Stang Jr, 64, at his home in Canton on Thursday morning.

Stang faces two counts of rape and gross sexual imposition, according to CantonRep.com.

Investigators allege that Stang repeatedly raped the two young daughters of Sarena Hall, 27.

Investigators allege Sarena Hall (left), 27, allowed Marion Stang Jr (right), 64, access to her two young daughters even though she knew he was sexually abusing them over a period of 'years'

Hall has been arrested and charged with two counts of felony endangering children

Hall was arrested an hour after Stang was taken into custody.

Stark County Jail records indicate that Hall was wanted on a warrant charging her with two counts of felony endangering children.

Prosecutors say that Hall knew about Stang's sexual abuse of her children yet still allowed him to have access to them.

Stang is said to be a family friend of Hall. Both of the girls are under the age of 10.

On Facebook, Hall describes herself as a 'stay at home mom.' Both she and Stang are being held without bond at Stark County Jail in Ohio

The abuse allegedly went on 'for a few years' until Child Protective Services in Summit County, Ohio, received an anonymous tip.

The tip triggered a criminal investigation, which resulted in the arrest of Stang and Hall.

Both were being held without bond at Stark County Jail on Friday.

On Facebook, Hall describes herself as a 'stay at home mom.'
